price: (Kidr) sọ pé: “Ǹjẹ́ èmi kò sọ fún ọ pé dájúdájú ìwọ kò níí lè ṣe sùúrú pẹ̀lú mi.”
arabic: ۞ قَالَ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكَ إِنَّكَ لَن تَسۡتَطِيعَ مَعِيَ صَبۡرٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: qāla alam aqul laka innaka lan tastaṭīʿa maʿiya ṣabran
